rows.label: tlk44400084_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Those are some peculiar clothes you're
wearing. You must be outlanders.

rows.label: tlk44400084_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You must find Luxuria rather nippy, no?
Feel free to warm yourselves up here.

rows.label: tlk44400084_01_msg0003
rows.name:
This is a hot water source. It's heated
up from within the Divine Beast's body and
gets circulated throughout the kingdom.

rows.label: tlk44400084_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's hard to get a warming meal
around these parts, so I come here
every day just to warm myself up.
